name: Soul Splitter
description:
"Traverse the city. Separate their SOULS from their bodies, and DON'T make us regret bringing you back to life." ART and MUSIC assets by ansimuz

BLAST and DASH your way through 20 levels of a cyberpunk city collecting SOULS to pay back your debt for rejuvenation by a mega-corp.

Made for the 3rd GDevelop Game Jam
